# Autogenerated file, run tools/build/setup_cmake.py to regenerate

include_directories(${ANN_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${CGAL_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_INCLUDE_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_INCLUDE_PATH})
link_directories(${ANN_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.RANDOM_LINK_PATH}
        ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LINK_PATH}
        ${CGAL_LINK_PATH}
        ${GPERFTOOLS_LINK_PATH}
        ${LOG4CXX_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LINK_PATH}
        ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LINK_PATH})

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${SYSTEM_CXX_FLAGS}")

set(cppbenchmarks )

foreach (bin ${cppbenchmarks})
   GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${bin} NAME_WE)
   add_executable(system.${name} ${bin})
   target_link_libraries(system.${name}     imp_system
    ${IMP_BASE_LIBRARY} ${IMP_CGAL_LIBRARY} ${IMP_ALGEBRA_LIBRARY} ${IMP_KERNEL_LIBRARY}
    ${IMP_BENCHMARK_LIBRARY}
    ${BOOST.FILESYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.PROGRAMOPTIONS_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.SYSTEM_LIBRARIES} ${GPERFTOOLS_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPPROFILER_LIBRARIES} ${TCMALLOC_HEAPCHECKER_LIBRARIES} ${LOG4CXX_LIBRARIES} ${BOOST.RANDOM_LIBRARIES} ${CGAL_LIBRARIES} ${ANN_LIBRARIES})
   set_target_properties(system.${name} PROPERTIES
                         RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/benchmark/system"
                         OUTPUT_NAME ${name})
   add_test(system.${name} ${IMP_TEST_SETUP}
            "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/benchmark/system/${name}${CMAKE_EXECUTABLE_SUFFIX}")
   set_tests_properties(system.${name} PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.system;benchmark")
   set_tests_properties(system.${name} PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 1200)
   set(executables ${executables} system.${name})
endforeach(bin)

add_custom_target("imp_system_benchmarks" ALL DEPENDS ${executables}
  # add dummy dep as empty targets seem to go away
  imp_system imp_base)

set(pybenchmarks )
foreach (test ${pybenchmarks})
 GET_FILENAME_COMPONENT(name ${test} NAME_WE)
 add_test("system.${name}" ${IMP_TEST_SETUP} python ${test})
 set_tests_properties("system.${name}" PROPERTIES LABELS "IMP.system;benchmark")
 set_tests_properties("system.${name}" PROPERTIES TIMEOUT 1200)
endforeach(test)
